projects.name: Zospace
projects.description: The first website I worked on in my internship at Zollege; Working off of a high-fidelity mockup, I developed the landing page and navigation menu for this new Zospace website to look great at all screen sizes. This project was achieved with a team of 5 developers, and I learned a lot about decision making as a team. /// Pixel perfect implementation of a product landing page design for Zospace Apps at Zollege

projects.name: Billy
projects.description: Billy - a full-stack application for tracking monthly bills. /// I designed and coded Elliot Smith Player, my capstone project at Austin Coding Academy, as a web player for artist Elliot Smith's discography. Searching for Elliot's songs, creating/saving customized playlists, and of course listening to the music are a few of the features available on the app.

projects.name: Small Business
projects.description: Local Small Business App created from a mockup design /// Small business directory app built from a mockup with react-redux and material-ui

projects.name: Music Dashboard
projects.description: Simple music dashboard app built using material-ui /// Music Dashboard App created from mockup design
